text: This store has a very nice view nearby the habor, it's quite peaceful place in the morning.

Great ambiance just to hangout or if you wanted to get your work done.
The service is good & the staffs are friendly
Just nice & cozy location to have a sip of your preferred drink with a view as an added bonus.

Recommended âœ…
Love the vibe here. Has a very relaxed atmosphere. Staff are friendly. There are indoor & outdoor seating available. Outdoor seating is looking over the harbour.

Very good service and great place for a coffee break at Puteri Harbour. Excellent place for a morning walk and they have good warm breakfast set here to relax after a walk. It's great to see this Starbucks is always clean with good service here at Puteri Harbour.

I'm curious how they get higher than 3 star.

Noisy environment, outdoor dining area dirty, crow keep barking.

WiFi coverage poor.

And the priority I concern is the coffee, what can I say the worst coffee I taste in Johor area.

Served inefficiently, Q 10 minutes just 1 customer in front of me, and waiting another 15 minutes for my coffee just because they forgotten my order.

Showy Starbucks outlet, truly disappointed.
